name: TSA2023 Flip or Skip
description:
Submission for TSA2023 Video Game Design:

by Rishi Aitha, Ronak Suchindra, Aarya Ganesan, Shiven Murthy, Siddhartha Satti, and Pranate Nadkarni

Flip or Skip: A party board game of risks and strategy!
Information on how to play and music credits are in-game.
